newLocationPurpose.locationBannerDescription: Looking for an Ames fencing company that you can trust? For more than two decades, Superior Fence & Rail has been building quality fences. We are an Ames fencing company that cares about our customers. Homeowners rely on us for exceptional products and installations. Each year, we buy more than 60 million pounds of fence products. Because we buy in large quantities, manufacturers offer us the most competitive prices. Those cost savings are passed on to our customers. We have more than 20,000 five-star reviews and a 94% customer satisfaction rating. For an Ames fence company that you can depend on consistently, consider Superior Fence & Rail.
newLocationPurpose.locationBannerHeading: For the highest quality fences, best service and industry’s best warranty.
newLocationPurpose.mapBelowDescription:
Alabaster fence company

Superior Fence & Rail is an Alabaster fence company that takes fencing projects to new heights. Our fence installers know how to handle any challenges that come their way. Therefore, you won’t have to worry about a thing during your fence project. Plus, we use the best fence materials throughout every project. We verify that each fence we build is constructed in accordance with your specifications, too. Tell us what you want to get out of your fence project, and we’ll deliver.

Alabaster fence contractor

We are an Alabaster fence contractor that puts its best foot forward in all that we do. For over two decades, Superior has been a top provider of fencing in the United States. No matter what fence project request we receive, we take it seriously. Our team learns what our customer wants to accomplish during their fence project. And we work diligently to transform their fence project vision into a reality. Our team can provide you with a great fence that is both attractive and economical. Let us know about your fence project request, and we are here to help.

Alabaster fence builder

Superior offers an Alabaster fence builder that fosters trust and loyalty. We use only premium fencing materials. This ensures we can provide fencing that maintains its appearance long after it is installed. Furthermore, we follow tried-and-true processes for fence construction. We don’t take shortcuts and commit the time, energy, and resources necessary to build each fence properly. Our team won’t settle for inferior fence installation results, either. We do what we can to verify your fence brings a smile to your fence.

Alabaster fence installation

If you want a worry-free Alabaster fence installation experience, partner with Superior. Our team won’t leave you hanging at any point during the fence installation process. Rather, we keep the lines of communication open. We make a plan and share it with you before your installation date. This ensures you know when we can install your fence and what we’ll do on your installation date. In addition, we have everything we need to install your fence when we arrive at your property. Thus, we should be able to install your fence in as little time as possible.

Alabaster fence financing

If you need Alabaster fence financing to start your fencing project, let us know. We have partnered with lenders that can help you get funding for your project. Our lenders offer loans up to $100,000 for commercial and residential fencing projects. To obtain financing, submit a loan application. You can then receive loan quotes with various terms. You may qualify for a fence loan with an interest rate as low as 4.99% APR. If you accept a loan, you can receive your funding and get your dream fence without delay.

Alabaster Fencing Options

We supply Alabaster fencing options that our rivals cannot match. For instance, we sell Alabaster privacy fence products that won’t force you to choose between style and function. If you need an Alabaster dog fence, we can assist. Our dog fencing makes it easy to provide your pet with a safe outdoor space to roam. Moreover, if you want an Alabaster pool fence, explore our pool fencing inventory. We sell eye-catching and versatile fence products for pools of all shapes and sizes.

Alabaster vinyl fence

We offer Alabaster vinyl fence products that deliver long-lasting value. Our vinyl fencing can provide a boost to your property’s curb appeal. We supply vinyl fencing equipped with SolarShield, our proprietary acrylic blend technology. SolarShield protects your vinyl fencing against damage from the sun’s brutal ultraviolet rays. We also include StayStrong rails with our vinyl fencing. These rails ensure your vinyl fence can withstand heavy winds. If you want a vinyl fence that complements your property and won’t wear down any time soon, partner with Superior.

Alabaster wood fence

We are an Alabaster wood fence company that puts your needs front and center. If you want a wood fence that is affordable and durable, we can help. Our wood fencing offers outstanding ROI. It can be installed around a garden or any other outdoor space with minimal effort. When we install wood fencing, we construct a fence on site. Our team uses the best lumber and other top-notch materials during construction. And we stain and seal our wood fencing for extra protection against the elements.

Alabaster aluminum fence

Expect nothing but greatness from our Alabaster aluminum fence products. This is due to the fact that we supply aluminum fencing from one of the nation’s premier manufacturers. Our aluminum fencing features SolarShield for protection against sun damage. Also, we test our aluminum fence powder coating against 3,000 hours of continuous salt spray. This testing confirms that our aluminum fencing will dazzle now and in the future. Take a look at our aluminum fencing, and you’re sure to find a fence that matches your requirements.

Call today for a free fence estimate. Your Superior Alabaster fence team is standing by. Call Superior Fence & Rail of Alabaster today at (205) 431-3160.

node.title: 10 Creative Privacy Fence Ideas for Your Backyard
node.content:
If you’ve been looking online for creative privacy fence ideas for your backyard, then you’re in luck! Your backyard fence doesn’t have to be plain or boring. You deserve a fence that you’re proud of, one that makes the entire neighborhood jealous. You deserve a stylish fence that’s durable, private, and affordable. Your fence will provide greater peace of mind as you won’t have nosy neighbors trying to peek into your backyard.

There are many kinds of privacy fences with unique designs for your gorgeous backyard. Superior Fence & Rail is committed to helping you find the perfect fence to suit your needs. Our expert team will quickly and efficiently install your dream fence, all at an affordable price. Continue reading to learn about some of the most creative privacy fence ideas for your backyard.

Privacy Fence Ideas You’ll Love

1. Board-on-Board Wood Fence

One great choice for a backyard privacy fence is a board-on-board wooden fence. These wooden fences use overlapping boards to provide complete privacy. If they are built properly, board-on-board wood fences can be incredibly durable and last for many years. If your main goal is to get a sleek, natural wooden fence that fully blocks out the rest of the world, this fence is a great choice.

2. Piano Key Lattice Redwood Fence

If a board-on-board fence isn’t your style, then perhaps a Piano Key lattice redwood fence is. This is a fence made of vertically-oriented wood slats that are evenly spaced apart, which creates a piano key pattern. You’ll likely be able to choose how far apart you want the wood slats to be. The Piano Key lattice is a gorgeous upgrade when compared to a traditional board-on-board redwood fence. You’ll love this fence so much that you’ll be singing its praises to the Piano Man every night!

3. Horizontal Redwood Fence

Horizontal privacy fences are quite popular these days. They boast a modern fence design that’s usually built with higher-quality redwood, or even exotic woods for a more sophisticated look. With this design, the redwood fence planks lay horizontally instead of vertically. You can choose to have 1 or 2 inches of space in between the planks. You may also opt to have the planks touching each other for maximum privacy. Your friends will all be jealous of your beautiful horizontal redwood fence whenever they stop by to visit!

4. Cedar Stockade Fence

Cedar is a gorgeous type of wood that’s lightweight and durable, making it a top pick for backyard privacy fences. A well-built cedar fence can easily stand up to all kinds of weather, as well as insects, rot, and decay. Cedar stockade fences have each vertical fence picket tightly installed side-by-side for lots of privacy. It’s also more affordable than other privacy fences. If you want a durable, visually appealing fence that won’t break the bank, invest in a cedar stockade fence!

5. Vinyl Picket Fence

The vinyl picket fence is a true American classic. You can’t go wrong with a traditional picket fence. However, if you choose a fencing company with high-quality vinyl and lots of color choices, you can really get creative. Vinyl picket fences are durable, aesthetically pleasing, and affordable. They may not offer as much privacy as other fences, but they can still effectively block out those nosy neighbors. If your old-school father-in-law ever comes over to visit, he’ll surely appreciate your vinyl picket fence!

6. Vinyl Fence with Lattice Top

Lattice fences combine the best of both worlds. The base provides total privacy, while the lattice top lets some light and air pass through. These vinyl fences are great for families with pools in their backyards. On a cool summer day, having some additional sun and a cool breeze can make those afternoon swims much more fun! 

7. Scalloped Vinyl Fence

A scalloped vinyl fence, on the other hand, adds small curves to the mix. They add a unique visual twist to your backyard and give it some extra elegance. They are also quite durable if they’re made from high-quality vinyl. Anyone driving by your house will surely be impressed by your stylish scalloped vinyl fence.

8. Picture Frame Board-on-Board Redwood Fence

This is a type of privacy fence where wooden boards are installed with an overlapping pattern, which creates a solid privacy barrier. Then, they’re framed with horizontal rails at the top and bottom. This gives your privacy fence that unique “picture frame” look. What makes this fence special is that it appears the same on both sides, giving a truly aesthetically pleasing appearance. It’s a beloved type of fence nationwide due to its beauty and durability. It’s also great for those pesky neighbors who always try to look into your backyard. These redwood fences use heavy-duty, pressure-treated wood that is highly resistant to termites and rot. Plus, the overlapping wooden boards greatly increase the strength of the fence, making it a smart choice for any homeowner.

9. Stepped Horizontal Trex Fence

Stepped horizontal Trex fences are a wonderful choice for those with backyards on a slope. They can mimic the form of a sloping backyard. Most Trex posts are made of a dense wood-plastic composite (WPC), making them incredibly sturdy. They also tend to be quite thick, which makes them great for areas with high wind. These fences can easily withstand inclement weather and keep your backyard protected from curious onlookers. Plus, the interlocking pickets that stepped horizontal Trex fences have will prevent any sort of gaps. This provides complete privacy and greater peace of mind for you and your family. If you’re in a nosy neighborhood with neighbors you can’t stand or trust, you’ll want a stepped horizontal Trex fence.

10. Chain Link Privacy Fence

Tall chain link fences can provide a decent amount of privacy for your backyard. They may not provide total privacy, but you can customize your fence! You can choose to block the view through the fence posts by adding plastic privacy slats. They come in many different colors and styles, giving you true creative freedom. You can also add some greenery to your fence for the privacy you crave. Consider adding flowers, vines, and shrubs to cover any open spots. If you’re looking for a simple yet sleek, heavy-duty privacy fence that’s easy to maintain, you’ll want a chain link fence. 

Ready to Bring Your Privacy Fence Ideas to Life?

It’s time to make your dream privacy fence a reality. When you need a beloved fencing company you can trust, look no further than Superior Fence & Rail. Get in touch with us today, and we’ll install the perfect privacy fence for your backyard!

node.altText: 10 Creative Privacy Fence Ideas for Your Backyard

node.title: Chain Link Fence Installation Experts – Superior Fence & Rail of Indianapolis
node.content:
You’re browsing online and searching for “chain link fence installation near me”. You can’t find the right company for the job. Have no fear, Superior Fence & Rail of Indianapolis is here. We are well-renowned for our exceptional fencing services across all of Indianapolis. Our expert fence builders will give your business or home the chain link fence it deserves. Continue reading to learn why Superior Fence & Rail is so popular, and discover how we can assist you. 

The Best Choice for Chain Link Fence Installation

We provide only the very best service to our Indianapolis customers. Superior Fence & Rail is committed to building sturdy, long-lasting chain link fences for every customer. We employ only the most professional and friendly staff to assist you with anything you need. Whether you need chain link fencing installed for a local business, or just want extra security for your home, we’re here for you. We want to provide you with a durable chain link fence that will surely deter any trespassers.

All our fence builders are licensed and insured, so you can breathe a sigh of relief with us on your side. We use only the highest-quality materials and resources to install your new chain link fence. 

Still not sure about choosing Superior Fence & Rail? Check out some of our latest reviews! We’re one of the highest-rated chain link fencing companies out there. Our 20,000+ five-star reviews and customer satisfaction rating of 94% make us stand out. We are beloved by so many customers for a reason. Now it’s time for you to see it for yourself as well. 

Where Can I Find a Chain Link Fence Nearby?

You’ll find chain link fencing in a lot of different places around Indianapolis. You will usually find chain link fencing near local businesses, schools, government buildings, pools, hospitals, and cemeteries. You have a higher chance of seeing a chain link fence surrounding a commercial property. However, it’s also possible to see one on residential properties. You might spot a 4 ft. tall chain link fence surrounding a backyard, or a 12 ft. tall chain link fence surrounding a top-secret government building.

Chain link fencing can also be found on farms, tennis and basketball courts, playgrounds, and other industrial businesses. Superior Fence & Rail has enough chain link fencing available for everyone, no matter what kind of property you’re buying it for.

What Makes Superior Fence & Rail Special?

Our extensive fencing services make us a top fencing company in Indianapolis. We spend lots of time and energy to ensure that every customer is satisfied with our work. We always give it our all to fully satisfy each customer’s needs every time. Even if the fencing is only needed on a short-term basis, we never skimp on quality.

Lots of construction companies will put up a chain link fence to prevent unauthorized individuals from entering construction sites. Superior goes above and beyond with bulk or wholesale fencing orders, so construction contractors can finish their projects on time.

All our fences offer unmatched durability and a sleek appearance, at an affordable price. Whether you need wooden fencing, vinyl fencing, or chain link fencing, you can always count on us.

Time to Call the Top Chain Link Fence Builder in Indianapolis

Superior Fence & Rail of Indianapolis is the chain link fencing company you can rely on. Our expert staff will always have the time, energy, and resources to install your ideal chain link fence. Plus, we use the best materials and offer the most reasonable prices, since everyone deserves a fence they’ll love. You don’t have to waste any more time searching online for the best chain link fence builder in Indianapolis. Contact us today at (317) 559-3343. We would love to hear from you!

node.title: Superior Fence & Rail of Columbus is the Top-Rated Fence Builder Near Me
node.content:
Don’t waste hours on end going online and searching for the “top-rated fence builder near me”. Instead, call the fencing experts at Superior Fence & Rail of Columbus. Our wooden fences are the best in all of Columbus. We bring years of professional experience to the table, helping to craft your ideal wooden fence. Continue reading to learn all about our wonderful wooden fencing services. 

The Most Popular Fence Builder Near Me

Superior Fence & Rail is a popular pick for customers looking for a new wooden fence. They know that we provide top-notch service to every customer, every day. Don’t believe us? Read some of our 20,000 five-star reviews nationwide, and you’ll understand why we have a 94% overall customer satisfaction rating. Superior Fence & Rail is a highly-rated fence company for a reason. 

Our fence building team is among the best in the industry. They are patient, experienced, and dedicated to the art of fence building. Plus, they know that a fence is a fundamental piece of any Columbus home. They will work with you and do their best to meet all of your fencing needs. Superior wooden fences always have a leg up on the competition because of this. When you need reliable, friendly, and efficient fencing services, you’ll always want to give us a call.

The Top Wood Fence Builders in Columbus – Superior Fence & Rail 

A large majority of our Columbus customers prefer wooden fencing over other kinds of fences. Superior Fence & Rail of Columbus uses only the best materials for your fence. We use high-quality, pressure-treated pine to build your wooden fence, right at your location. This way, you will be certain that you picked the right fencing company.

You also get a 15-year warranty against termite damage and rot, plus a lifetime warranty for wooden fence posts and horizontal rails. With a variety of customization options available, you’ll be thrilled with your fencing choice, and won’t ever want to trust any other company for your fencing needs!

Our Process

We fully install your new wood fence right on your property. Each wood post is set in concrete to stay sturdy and upright. We then use hot-dipped galvanized ring shank nails to attach each board. This helps them resist rust and other kinds of damage. Our custom buildings are much stronger than pre-made panels, thanks to this method. Your heavy-duty wood fence is designed to endure harsh conditions.

Our board-on-board style provides complete coverage and privacy with overlapping boards. Stockade fencing uses boards that sit next to each other without overlapping for extra privacy. The shadowbox style offers some privacy from the outside world. However, it isn’t fully opaque from the side, meaning it has lower wind resistance.

Wood fencing typically isn’t as tough as vinyl or aluminum fences. With some regular maintenance, your wood fence can look sleek and beautiful for years on end. Regular staining and sealing protect against inclement weather, fading, and other damage. We offer all the classic wood fence styles for your home. Our fence builders can also customize special designs if you have a specific plan for enhancing your home.

Ready to Get Started?

Finding the best wood fence builders doesn’t have to be a struggle. Superior Fence & Rail of Columbus is here to meet all your fencing needs. Your Superior wood fence will never let you or your property down. Our expert staff knows all about installing the perfect wooden fence to meet your needs. We’re always ready to collaborate with you to provide you with the fence of your dreams. So don’t wait! Contact us today, or give us a call at (614) 362-8471. We can’t wait to hear from you!

node.title: Superior Fence & Rail of Rhode Island – The Best “Fence Company Near Me”
node.content:
You don’t have to waste hours on end going online, desperately searching for a “fence company near me.” Instead, just go to the fence installation experts at Superior Fence & Rail of Rhode Island. We’re one of the highest-rated and best-equipped fencing companies in the northeastern United States. We provide over 1,000 types of fences to our customers every day. Whatever fence you need for your Rhode Island Home, we have it. Continue reading to learn more about our unbeatable fencing services.

What’s the Highest-Rated Fence Company Near Me?

Superior Fence & Rail is the top name when it comes to fence companies. We are not only the best in Rhode Island but also in southeastern Massachusetts. We have the reviews to prove it. Just check out our 94% overall customer satisfaction rating or our 20,000+ five-star reviews. You will soon understand why Superior Fence & Rail is the beloved fence company that customers work with on a daily basis. 

Our team of experienced and friendly fence builders will give you exactly what you need and craft the ideal fence to suit your home or business. Plus, we possess the skills and expertise to fully educate you on our fence installation process. This ensures you’re never left in the dark about the work we’re doing. Once you’ve partnered with us, you’ll never have to go online and search “fence companies near me” or “fence contractors near me” ever again. We have the patience, experience, and dedication to fence building to deliver exactly what you need.

Superior Fence & Rail – The Best All-Purpose Fencing Company Near Me

Think of almost any type of fence, and we have it! Superior Fence & Rail of Rhode Island boasts a massive catalog of over 1,000 fence types. This enables us to satisfy every single one of our customers each day. Whether you need a sleek wooden or vinyl fence for your home, a sturdy aluminum fence, or a chain link fence for a local business, we have it all. 

Vinyl Fences

We’re one of the only fencing companies that sources and designs our own vinyl fences. This way, we can offer special features such as PrivacyLock, SolarShield, StayStrong, and HeartWood to our customers. Unlike other fence companies that source from distributors and skimp on product quality, we provide the very best vinyl fences possible, every time. 

We’ve learned a great deal about the vinyl fencing process, as we have more than 20 years of experience in fabricating and installing millions of feet of vinyl fencing. This has led us to become the first fence company to set our own vinyl specifications, ensuring that every single one of our customers gets a consistent and top-notch fence.

Choose from a wide range of styles, colors, and profiles for your vinyl fence. Superior Fence & Rail puts the power back in YOUR hands, so that you can get a beautiful, customized, and durable vinyl fence that will last for years to come.

Wooden Fences

Wooden fencing is one of the top choices for many of our Rhode Island customers. Its affordability and sleek, natural look make it a highly-requested product. Superior Fence & Rail of Rhode Island uses only the highest-quality, pressure-treated pine to build your wooden fence right on-site, providing you with greater peace of mind. 

With a 15-year warranty against rot and termite damage, as well as a lifetime warranty for your wooden fence posts and horizontal rails, and many different customization options, you’ll never want to pick another fencing company again once you’ve worked with us! 

Aluminum Fences

If you’ve been searching for “fencing companies near me” that can provide you with a strong aluminum fence, you’re in luck! node.title: The Best Commercial Fence Contractors in Eastern NC
node.content:
Finding the right commercial fence contractors for your fencing projects can be a challenge, but it doesn’t have to be! With Superior Fence & Rail of Eastern NC, you’ll have greater peace of mind knowing you’ll get the strongest and most dependable fence in your area. Our skilled commercial fencing contractors are here to provide your home or business with the perfect chain link fence, aluminum fence, or vinyl fence that meets your needs. Keep reading to discover more about our highly-rated commercial fencing services!

Why We’re the Commercial Fence Contractors You Can Rely On

At Superior Fence & Rail of Eastern NC, we are dedicated to delivering top-notch service to all our clients. Whether it’s installing commercial fencing for a local business or enhancing the security of a home, we are here to fulfill their requirements. Our goal is to offer our customers a reliable and sturdy fencing solution that effectively deters trespassers and thieves.

Additionally, all our commercial fencing contractors are fully licensed and insured, meaning that you can rest easy knowing that you’ve got true experts on your side. For extra reassurance, our team uses only the finest materials and resources for every chain link fence installation.

If you’re still on the fence about choosing our services, we encourage you to take a look at our recent reviews. We are proud to be one of the top-rated commercial fencing companies in Greenville and all of eastern North Carolina, boasting over 20,000 five-star reviews nationwide and a customer satisfaction rating of 94%.

Where Can I Find Commercial Fencing?

There are a bunch of different locations where you’re likely to spot commercial fencing. Typically, you’ll encounter chain link fencing, along with aluminum and vinyl options, around local businesses, schools, government facilities, swimming pools, hospitals, and cemeteries, among others. While chain link fences are more commonly seen around commercial properties, they can also be found in residential areas. For instance, you might spot a 4-foot chain link fence enclosing a backyard, or a taller 12-foot version around a government building for security purposes.

You can also find commercial fencing at tennis and basketball courts, farms, playgrounds, and various industrial sites. Whatever type of property you need fencing for, you can count on Superior Fence & Rail to have a wide selection of chain link, vinyl, and aluminum fencing available for everyone.

What Makes Superior Fence & Rail Stand Out?

Our vast array of fencing services makes us one of the most popular commercial fencing companies in all of North Carolina. We devote lots of time and energy in ensuring that all our customers are satisfied with our work. Chain link fencing has a long history, dating all the way back to 1844, and since then, we have significantly improved the chain link fence for maximum customer satisfaction, every single time. 

Many construction companies usually install a chain link fence to keep non-authorized individuals out of harm’s way. We go above and beyond by selling bulk or wholesale orders of chain link fencing to construction contractors so that they can finish their work on time. Plus, we make our fences from woven steel wire, then we either galvanize them in zinc or coat them in vinyl. The choice is yours, but both options provide you with a durable, long-lasting chain link fence. We even offer extra privacy slats to add to your chain link fence, so that neighbors and passersby can’t see what you’re up to.

All our fences provide unparalleled strength and durability at a price you can afford. Whether you’re in search of wooden fencing, vinyl fencing, aluminum fencing, gates and access control, or chain link fencing, you will always be able to come to us for your fencing needs.

We’re the only commercial fencing company you can consistently rely on since we have the time, resources, and fencing experts needed to fulfill all your fencing requests. If you’d like to learn more about our wonderful fencing services, you should contact us today or give us a call at (252) 359-4661. node.title: Superior Fence & Rail of Kansas City Provides the Best Picket Fences
node.content:
Are you in the market for the perfect picket fence? Then Superior Fence & Rail of Kansas City is exactly who you’ll want on your side. We are experts when it comes to fence building, as all our fences are carefully crafted to last for many years. Whether you’re looking for an aluminum fence or a sturdy wood picket fence, we’ve got you covered. Continue reading to learn more about why a Superior wooden picket fence may be the smartest choice for your Kansas City home.

Why Choose Us for Your Picket Fence?

Superior Fence & Rail has everything you’re looking for when it comes to a picket fence. For starters, we use only the highest-quality pressure-treated pine lumber to build your wood fence. Our lumber beats out the competition because it is durable and built to last in inclement weather. Superior lumber fence pickets also come with a minimum fifteen-year warranty against termite damage and rot for greater peace of mind. 

We take every project very seriously and put our best foot forward at all times to ensure that you’re satisfied with our work. If something isn’t installed to your liking, let us know, and we will fix it right away. Our team of fence picket experts treats every customer like family and is responsive to your feedback. Plus, we’ll always communicate with you and keep you updated on the progress of our fence installation every step of the way. You are not just a customer to us – you are a partner, and we will work together to deliver the perfect picket fence.

Still don’t believe us? You might want to check out some of our 40+ five-star reviews on Google, as well as nearly 20,000 five-star reviews nationwide. With an overall satisfaction rating of 94%, our customers can always count on us to deliver the high-quality fence pickets they need and deserve.

The Picket Wood Fence You Deserve

A properly constructed wood picket fence can last for many years with proper care and maintenance. Plus, it will provide security, privacy, and property demarcation for your backyard. And it can serve as a decorative element to your property that will increase your home’s value. If you’re a homeowner in the Kansas City area, you’ll definitely want to invest in a wood picket fence.

After all, wood picket fences are one of the most sought-after kinds of fences on the market today. Superior Fence & Rail of Kansas City is your local wood fence company of choice. Wood pickets are affordable for many homeowners and can add a gorgeous natural look that complements your home’s landscaping and garden.

Will My Wooden Fence Need To Be Stained Or Sealed?

Even though our wooden picket fences are naturally sleek and beautiful, they will most need to be stained and/or sealed at some point. This is because humidity changes can cause wood to naturally expand and contract. This is a normal occurrence, so do not worry if you notice this happening to your fence pickets. Keep in mind that not properly treating your wood picket fence can cause it to crack, warp, or fade over time. Staining and/or sealing each fence picket will also help prevent any mold, rot, and decay from developing over time. 

How Often Will I Need To Stain Or Seal My Wooden Fence?

How often you’ll need to stain or seal your new wood picket fence depends on the type of wood used, the time of year, and the current climate in your area. With a pressure-treated pine fence, you’ll need to wait until the wood is completely dry before attempting to stain or seal it. If the wood is still wet when you stain or seal the fence pickets, the treatment will not adhere properly to the wood. However, waiting too long may result in your picket fence weathering too quickly. As a result, you may have to sand or wash it with a special cleaner to stain or seal it properly.

Keep these general guidelines in mind when deciding how long to wait before staining or sealing your new wood picket fence. You should consider the type of wood used for your picket fence and then wait between 1 and 6 months before staining or sealing your fence. This will allow your wood pickets to be sufficiently dried, weathered, and cured. You likely won’t have to wait as long if you live in an area that is typically drier and does not receive a lot of rain.

Superior Fence & Rail of Kansas City will provide you with some best practices for staining or sealing your wood picket fence for the first time. We’ll also share our recommendations on how often you should restain or reseal your fence pickets. 

What Other Fence Picket Styles Do We Have?

Superior Fence & Rail is the top fencing company in Kansas City for a reason. Not only do we offer fully customizable wood picket fences, but we also provide other kinds of fence picket styles for your home or business. Other popular alternatives to a wood picket fence are the vinyl picket fence and aluminum picket fence.

Vinyl Picket Fence

A Superior vinyl picket fence showcases the charm of the classic “white picket fence”. All our vinyl products were designed by Superior Fence and Rail strictly for Superior Fence and Rail. With truly innovative features such as PrivacyLock, SolarShield, StayStrong, and HeartWood, you get more than just a fence; you get the best fence. Our fence profiles are among the sturdiest in the industry and are backed by a lifetime transferable warranty. You will get a top-quality vinyl fence, and most importantly, you will get peace of mind.

What Is PrivacyLock? PrivacyLock is a unique locking mechanism that eliminates the risk of failure compared to other vinyl fences. Unlike traditional tongue and groove fencing, our PrivacyLock locks together giving you superior security with your vinyl fence. 

  • What is SolarShield? Naturally, the sun can discolor standard vinyl fencing since fences are outdoors and exposed to the elements. This is why all Superior Fences come standard with SolarShield. This consists of a proprietary acrylic blend that protects your fence from the harmful UV rays of the sun. SolarShield gives your vinyl fence a protective outer layer engineered to reduce oxidation significantly and the damaging effects of the sun’s rays. Even in harsh climates, SolarShield protects the color and sheen of your fence for longer periods of time in comparison to other vinyl fencing products. Simply put, there is no better protection under the sun than SolarShield. 
  • What Is StayStrong? We invented StayStrong so your vinyl fence can withstand greater wind loads, making your fence stronger. This strength is possible because we engineered our rails with 33% deeper grooves so that more of the picket embeds in the rail.
  • What Is HeartWood? Our HeartWood vinyl fence line gives you the rustic, warm beauty of wood without the maintenance! HeartWood comes in two amazing color selections: Golden Oak and Red Chestnut.

Aluminum Picket Fence

Superior Fence & Rail of Kansas City has four unique aluminum fencing product lines from which you can choose. We also offer additional fence picket spacing and rail height options for even greater customization to your liking.

Superior offers the best selection of product styles and grades on the market. All of our aluminum fencing products include SolarShield technology to prevent fence picket fading and chalking. Our powder coating goes well above and beyond the industry standard and our fencing can easily withstand up to 3,000 hours of continuous salt spray testing, which is double the amount that most fences can handle!

Aluminum is an incredibly strong and durable metal that can last for quite a long time. These fences are an excellent choice for anyone living in an area with inclement weather and not wanting to spend too much time or money on costly fence picket repairs.

Whether you’re shopping for an aluminum picket fence, vinyl or a wooden picket fence, you can rest assured knowing that our Superior fencing is guaranteed to stand strong. 

Call Us Today for Your New Wood Picket Fence

Superior Fence & Rail is excited to work with you and install a heavy-duty wood picket fence for your Kansas City home. We’ll work with you to build a custom fence that perfectly suits your needs, with sturdy fence pickets that will stand the test of time. So what are you waiting for? Give us a call today at (913) 745-7924, or contact us online. We’d love to hear from you!

node.title: Need To Know About A Property Survey For Fence? Superior Fence & Rail Of Palm Beach Has The Answers
node.content:
Being in the fence business, we receive a ton of questions. Especially when local home and business owners are in the planning stages of a fence. One of the number one inquiries we get is regarding the need for a property survey for fence. As the area’s top-rated fence company, Superior Fence & Rail of Palm Beach has the answers to all your property survey-related fence questions. This includes questions about property lines for fences, how to determine property lines prior to installing a fence, and much more. In this blog, we will cover all the bases when it comes to the details of starting the process of a new fence installation.

Do I Need A Property Survey For A Fence?

Yes. Most professional remodeling, home improvement, and outdoor improvement projects will require a copy of your property survey before proceeding. At Superior Fence & Rail, we need a copy of your survey to acquire any necessary permits for your new fence installation. And when measuring for your new fence. In addition, if you reside in a neighborhood or community with a homeowner’s association (HOA), they will likely need one as part of your HOA review process.

Is Land Survey For Fence The Same As A Property Survey For Fence?

Land surveys are an essential part of starting a new project, selling property, or purchasing a new property. Sometimes a land survey is referred to as a property survey. The two have very similar, but not identical definitions.  A property survey confirms the boundaries of a given property according to records and legal descriptions. This is the type of survey most often used when installing a new fence.

A land survey shows the shape and boundaries of a piece of land. Property surveys are usually a requirement when hiring a professional for improvements to your home and/or property. A land survey is crucial when considering purchasing land or a home. This is to ensure you know exactly what you are purchasing.

In the trade, you may also hear the term “plot plan.” A plot plan usually involves the construction of a new home, where the home is figured into a property survey. This shows where the home is on the plot of land and also shows all setbacks and right-of-ways. A plot plan is required to obtain a certificate of occupancy (CO) in most counties to pass final inspections and allow you to close on your home and move in.

How To Determine Property Lines For Fence

First and foremost, before measuring for your fence, you must determine your property line boundaries. You will need to have a copy of your property survey to ensure your fence placement is within the correct boundaries. Keep in mind, it is also important that you are aware of any required setbacks or right-of-way’s (if applicable for your property), prior to measuring. If you do not have a property survey, it is crucial that you do. This is not only for your new fence installation but also because many professional contractors will require one before doing any kind of remodeling or improvement project on your property. A survey is the only way you can accurately determine your property boundaries. As a proactive home or business owner, this is an important document to keep on hand for reference.

How Do I Mark Property Lines?

Surveyors will generally mark the 4-corners of your property with a ribbon or stake during your initial survey of the property. In many cases, these markers may still be visible years down the road. This will give you some idea of where your property lines are; however, to be certain, we recommend looking at your property survey for the exact location of your property lines. If you cannot use your survey as a reference to mark the lines yourself, contact a professional surveyor for guidance. Remember that most reputable fence companies, such as Superior Fence & Rail, can determine your property lines based on your property survey or plot plan.

How To Measure For A New Fence

Many fencing specialists suggest you use a fencing formula to measure for a fence. However, the formula is as simple as measuring the length of your fence line accurately and then dividing by the width of the panels. Here at Superior Fence & Rail of Palm Beach, we take all the guesswork out of how to measure for a fence and other fence parameter questions.

As your local professional fence installer, we do all this for you! If you have a copy of your property survey and tell us the preferred location of your fence, we can work with you to make sure your fence is within your property boundaries, abiding by any setbacks or right-of-ways. Additionally, we will ensure your proposed fence complies with any local zoning and/or ordinance requirements. We will also make sure your fence is permitted if applicable. Superior also offers direct assistance with HOA approval of your fence if this is a requirement in your neighborhood.

Superior Fence & Rail Has The Answers!

As the highest-rated fence company in Palm Beach, we ensure your fence is professionally planned and installed. We can help ensure all guidelines are met according to your individual property specifications. We have the answers to all the most-asked questions about measuring for your new fence and property lines/boundaries:

  • How to measure for a fence.
  • Do I need property survey for fence?
  • How to measure property lines.
  • How to measure property boundaries.
  • How do I determine my property boundaries?
  • How do I determine property lines for fence?
  • How do I mark property line?
  • How to measure property line.
  • Measure my lot.
  • How do I measure my property line?
  • How to measure your property line.
  • The answer to these questions and more is just a phone call away … Call us at
    (561) 513-5095. We would love to hear from you.

If you are searching for a high-quality fence company in the Palm Beach area, contact Superior Fence & Rail, your trusted fence company for over two decades.  Rest assured that your fence will be constructed from the highest quality materials, and your installation experience will be professional and worry-free.
